TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeInfo2 implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo

remarks.para: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions.

summary.para: Provides the managed definition of the ITypeInfo2 interface.

summary.para: Gets all custom data items for the library.

returns.para: The return value obtained from the returned HRESULT is one of the following:

description.para: One or more of the arguments is invalid.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetDllEntry(int32 memid, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.INVOKEKIND invKind, native int pBstrDllName, native int pBstrName, native int pwOrdinal) cil managed

remarks.para: For additional information about ITypeInfo::GetDllEntry, see the MSDN Library.

summary.para: Retrieves a description or specification of an entry point for a function in a DLL.

Docs.param: The ID of the member function whose DLL entry description is to be returned.
One of the values that specifies the kind of member identified by .
If not null, the function sets to a BSTR that contains the name of the DLL.
If not null, the function sets to a BSTR that contains the name of the entry point.
If not null, and the function is defined by an ordinal, then is set to point to the ordinal.

summary.para: Maps between member names and member IDs, and parameter names and parameter IDs.

Docs.param: An array of names to map.
The count of names to map.
When this method returns, contains a reference to an array in which name mappings are placed. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
